Class SBAccountDataController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.justyna.stachera.householdexpenses.controller.SBAccountDataController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SBWebsitesAndMessages

    @Controller
public class SBAccountDataController
extends java.lang.Object
implements SBWebsitesAndMessages
    Version:
    2.0

    User: jstachera

    Date: 02.01.2018

    Controller class with methods that support '/accountData/**' links directly.

    Author:
    Justyna Stachera.

                                           SBPasswordValidator passwordValidator)
        An argument constructor autowired interfaces extending JpaRepository and Validator objects.
        Parameters:
        userDao - It provides methods related with 'sbuser' table from database.
        userCustomDao - It provides extra methods related with 'sbuser' table from database.
        personValidator - It validates SBPerson object fields.
        passwordValidator - It validates SBPassword object fields.
